医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Insilico Medicine 的泛 TEAD 抑制剂 ISM6331 获得 FDA IND 批准用于治疗间皮瘤Insilico Medicine (“Insilico”) 是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能 (AI) 驱动的生物技术公司，今天宣布 ISM6331，潜在的同类最佳泛 TEAD 抑制剂，已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 在研继 2024 年 6 月获得孤儿药资格 (ODD) 后，治疗间皮瘤的新药 (IND) 获得批准。这使得 Insilico 的 IND 批准分子总数达到 9 个。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Insilico-Medicines-pan-TEAD-inhibitor-ISM6331-receives-FDA-IND-clearance-for-mesothelioma-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Insilico-Medicines-pan-TEAD-inhibitor-ISM6331-receives-FDA-IND-clearance-for-mesothelioma-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f98613a8-9a46-4882-b24c-6d5f92bfe58f Thu, 08 Aug 2024 22:35:18 -0400 Insilico Medicine's pan-TEAD inhibitor ISM6331 receives FDA IND clearance for mesothelioma treatment
老年人饮酒会增加跌倒后严重头部外伤的风险在全国范围内，跌倒仍然是老年人致命和非致命伤害的主要原因，也是创伤性脑损伤的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Alcohol-use-in-older-adults-linked-to-increased-risk-of-severe-head-trauma-after-falls.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Alcohol-use-in-older-adults-linked-to-increased-risk-of-severe-head-trauma-after-falls.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a63bfed6-37e3-4445-a157-9ccd3f2b5ed1 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 22:12:08 -0400 Alcohol use in older adults linked to increased risk of severe head trauma after falls
药物在治疗乳腺癌脑转移或复发性胶质母细胞瘤方面显示出新的前景德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心 (UT Health San Antonio) 进行的一项前瞻性机会之窗试验结果显示，一种有效治疗乳腺癌的药物在治疗伴有脑转移或复发性胶质母细胞瘤的乳腺癌方面显示出新的希望。 ）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Drug-shows-new-promise-in-treating-breast-cancer-with-brain-metastases-or-recurrent-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Drug-shows-new-promise-in-treating-breast-cancer-with-brain-metastases-or-recurrent-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c5ca98b-5a70-4721-bb8b-df7634721877 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 22:04:54 -0400 Drug shows new promise in treating breast cancer with brain metastases or recurrent glioblastoma
研究揭示地中海饮食在降低感知压力方面的作用纽约州立大学宾厄姆顿大学的一个团队进行的最新研究表明，与传统的西方饮食相比，遵循地中海饮食可能会让你感觉压力更小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Study-reveals-the-Mediterranean-diets-role-in-lowering-perceived-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Study-reveals-the-Mediterranean-diets-role-in-lowering-perceived-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e51112e-13d9-407a-a632-ce0704ae697c Thu, 08 Aug 2024 21:03:38 -0400 Study reveals the Mediterranean diet's role in lowering perceived stress
美国心脏病学会发布了关于管理因心力衰竭住院患者的最新指南美国心脏病学会发布了关于管理因心力衰竭 (HF) 住院的患者的最新指南，以提供根据临床轨迹定制治疗的决策途径，以更好地管理疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/American-College-of-Cardiology-releases-updated-guidance-on-managing-病人-hospitalized-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/American-College-of-Cardiology-releases-updated-guidance-on-managing-病人-hospitalized-for-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44e237f9-0d5c-47ae-bf97-e2d2593a98e5 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 20:58:20 -0400 American College of Cardiology releases updated guidance on managing patients hospitalized for heart failure
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：华尔兹唱片明尼苏达州州长蒂姆·沃尔兹是副总统卡马拉·哈里斯选择的竞选搭档。沃尔兹也是前美国国会议员、高中教师和国民警卫队成员，具有中西部的民风和自由主义倾向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-The-Walz-record.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-The-Walz-record.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8899e205-cfd7-425f-9d56-789ec624cad8 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 20:51:45 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': The Walz record
研究发现，COVID-19 期间学校重新开放与青少年心理健康紧急情况激增有关研究发现，意大利新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 疫情导致学校重新开放，导致青少年精神科紧急情况显着增加，尤其是女性，凸显了重返学业和社会压力对心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/School-reopenings-during-COVID-19-linked-to-spike-in-youth-mental-health-emergcies-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/School-reopenings-during-COVID-19-linked-to-spike-in-youth-mental-health-emergcies-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b79e2bc2-babf-464c-80e5-ec465fdd051b Thu, 08 Aug 2024 20:45:00 -0400 School reopenings during COVID-19 linked to spike in youth mental health emergencies, study finds
研究发现，富含麸皮的玉米粉可降低成人低密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平升高研究发现，富含麸皮的玉米粉可显着降低胆固醇升高的成年人的低密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平，同时对肠道微生物群组成的影响最小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Bran-enriched-corn-flour-lowers-LDL-cholesterol-in-adults-with-elevated-levels-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Bran-enriched-corn-flour-lowers-LDL-cholesterol-in-adults-with-elevated-levels-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=326305c9-e663-4d0c-8c35-12596d710e11 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 20:30:00 -0400 Bran-enriched corn flour lowers LDL cholesterol in adults with elevated levels, study finds
导致患有 2 型糖尿病的老年女性骨折风险更高的是身体机能不佳，而非骨密度研究表明，患有 2 型糖尿病的老年女性骨折的风险较高，主要是由于身体功能受损，而不是骨密度降低，尽管其骨骼结构更强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Poor-physical-function-not-bone-密度-drives-higher-fracture-risk-in-older-women-with-type-2-diabetes。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Poor-physical-function-not-bone-密度-drives-higher-fracture-risk-in-older-women-with-type-2-diabetes。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=709a407a-c3f8-4a75-9449-f29a947fd6c6 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 20:20:00 -0400 Poor physical function, not bone density, drives higher fracture risk in older women with type 2 diabetes
含有水果和蔬菜的低酸饮食可显着改善高血压患者的肾脏和心脏健康研究发现，低酸饮食，特别是富含水果和蔬菜的饮食，可以为原发性高血压患者提供显着的肾脏和心血管保护，效果优于传统医疗护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Low-acid-diets-with-fruits-and-vegetables-significantly-improve-kidney-and-heart-health-in-hypertension-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Low-acid-diets-with-fruits-and-vegetables-significantly-improve-kidney-and-heart-health-in-hypertension-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d98d6560-784f-45e3-af9f-4f2efe95cc04 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 20:09:00 -0400 Low-acid diets with fruits and vegetables significantly improve kidney and heart health in hypertension patients
